articles.description:

articles.title: Covid-19 May Temporarily Lower Sperm Count & Motility, A New Study Shows - Romper
articles.description: New research out of Europe has found that contracting Covid-19 can impair sperm quality, including sperm counts and motility, for months after infection.
articles.content: Couples looking to conceive may have even more reason to avoid contracting Covid-19, according to a new study. In examining semen samples from men whod recently recovered from the virus, researchers … [+3995 chars]

articles.description: ‘Astounding’ rally comes after flows from key Russian pipeline stop and buyers rush to secure supplies
